name: Ring of Pain
summary: Roguelike flavour, card game pacing. Randomised, chaos embracing. Dungeon crawl in a card game, no walking required! No empty tiles, nowhere to hide. Manage inventory, strategise. Learn, adapt or face demise...
info:
• 发行: Humble Games
  • 别名: 苦痛之环
  • 别名: 痛苦之戒
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Switch
  • 游戏类型: Roguelike, Card game, Dungeon crawl
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2020-10-15
  • 官方网站: http://ringofpain.com
  • 开发: Simon Boxer, Twice Different
